note:
YAMG (yet another map geek)
#Cartonaut

You and I are animals that evolved in a universe with at least 3 dimensions plus time. We've been orienting and reorienting ever since we were single cell organisms in the ocean and in the womb. With our senses we've been mapping as long as we can remember (literally, memory is key to our ability to map) and it comes to us like breathing. I'm here to celebrate big deep gulps of fresh maps.

#map #maps #cartography #GIS #mapping #topographic

note:
I teach journalism at NYU, critique the press, try to suggest reforms. PressThink is the name of my subject and my site. "Chill before serving" is my social media motto. Elvis Costello's version of "What's so funny 'bout peace, love, and understanding" is my theme song.

jr3@nyu.edu

Mostly posting my own articles and photography that I share with nearly half a million followers on social media. Still feel new here, but I like Mastodon; it’s a breath of fresh air. What more to know? I’m the editor of The Planet: theplanet.substack.com and: Public Speaker | Podcaster | TEDx | Climate Change | Wildlife | Art | Energy-Water-Food | Sustainability
